questions.question: Does this checkpoint outline capture the right flow? I've structured it as vertical slices where CP1 gives you a complete (if minimal) talk, and each subsequent checkpoint adds depth.

options.label: Approve outline
options.description: This captures the flow well. Let's proceed to detailing Checkpoint 1.

options.label: Adjust checkpoints
options.description: The overall structure is off - let me explain what needs to change.

options.label: Merge some checkpoints
options.description: 6 checkpoints feels like too many for this project - combine some.

questions.question: Does this task group breakdown for Checkpoint 1 make sense? The flow is: Title → Problem → About Me (with hook) → Solution Intro → Clean up file structure.

options.label: Approve task groups
options.description: This breakdown captures the work needed. Let's detail the tasks.

options.label: Adjust grouping
options.description: The grouping could be better - let me suggest changes.

options.label: Merge groups
options.description: Some of these could be combined into fewer groups.

questions.question: Task Group 1.1 (Update Title Slide) has one task: Update the title, subtitle, and QR code. This is straightforward - should I proceed to generate the specific actions?

options.label: Approve task
options.description: Yes, generate the actions for this task.

options.label: Add task
options.description: There's something else needed in this task group.

questions.question: These are the actions for updating the title slide. Any adjustments needed?

options.label: Approve actions
options.description: These actions capture the work. Let's continue to the next task group.

options.label: Adjust actions
options.description: Something needs to be changed in these actions.

questions.question: Task Group 1.2 (Create Problem Overview Slide) - one task to create a new problem slide with placeholder stats. This will be fleshed out in CP2. Proceed?

options.label: Approve task
options.description: Yes, generate the actions for this task.

options.label: Adjust task
options.description: The task scope needs adjustment.

questions.question: Actions for creating the problem overview slide. This creates a minimal version that CP2 will expand. Approve?

options.label: Approve actions
options.description: These actions capture the work. Continue to next task group.

options.label: Adjust actions
options.description: Something needs to change.

questions.question: Task Group 1.3 (Update About Me) - restructure to include the "proof of real value" hook with v-clicks for dramatic reveal of numbers. Proceed?

options.label: Approve task
options.description: Yes, generate the actions.

options.label: Adjust task
options.description: The task scope needs adjustment.

questions.question: Actions for restructuring the about-me slide with the hook. The v-clicks will reveal each number dramatically. Approve?

options.label: Approve actions
options.description: These actions capture the work. Continue to next task group.

options.label: Adjust actions
options.description: Something needs to change.

questions.question: Task Group 1.4 (Create Solution Transition) - one task to create a brief pivot slide from problem to solution. This sets up CP3's detailed skills content. Proceed?

options.label: Approve task
options.description: Yes, generate the actions.

options.label: Adjust task
options.description: The task scope needs adjustment.

questions.question: Actions for the solution transition slide. Keeps it brief - just a pivot point. Approve?

options.label: Approve actions
options.description: These actions capture the work. Continue to next task group.

options.label: Adjust actions
options.description: Something needs to change.

questions.question: Task Group 1.5 (Reorganize Files) - three tasks: rename conclusion to 99, delete old agenda slide, run build:slides. This completes CP1. Proceed?

options.label: Approve tasks
options.description: Yes, generate the actions for these tasks.

options.label: Adjust tasks
options.description: The task scope needs adjustment.

questions.question: Actions for file reorganization tasks. This completes Checkpoint 1 detailing. Ready to write all this to plan.json?

options.label: Approve actions
options.description: Yes, write to plan.json and complete CP1 detailing.

options.label: Adjust actions
options.description: Something needs to change.

tool_input.old_string:
{
          "id": "1.2",
          "title": "Create Problem Overview Slide",
          "objective": "New slide introducing the core problem (placeholder for Cortex data) - sets up 'why this matters'",
          "status": "pending",
          "tasks": []
        },
        {
          "id": "1.3",
          "title": "Update About Me with Hook Structure",
          "objective": "Restructure about-me to include the 'proof of real value' hook with placeholders for numbers",
          "status": "pending",
          "tasks": []
        },
        {
          "id": "1.4",
          "title": "Create Solution Transition Slide",
          "objective": "Quick transition slide that pivots from problem to 'the answer is skills'",
          "status": "pending",
          "tasks": []
        },
        {
          "id": "1.5",
          "title": "Reorganize File Structure",
          "objective": "Rename conclusion slide to 99-conclusion.md, delete obsolete slides, run build:slides",
          "status": "pending",
          "tasks": []
        }

questions.question: Task groups for Checkpoint 2 (Problem & Credibility Deep Dive). This expands the minimal CP1 content with full Cortex data, the meme, and personal anecdote. Proceed?

options.label: Approve task groups
options.description: This breakdown captures the work. Let's detail the tasks.

options.label: Adjust grouping
options.description: The grouping could be better - let me suggest changes.

options.label: Skip CP2 for now
options.description: Let's finalize CP1 and come back to CP2-6 later.

questions.question: Here's the full task breakdown for CP2. The key change is separating the hook into its own slide (04) for dramatic effect. Should I write this to plan.json?

options.label: Approve all
options.description: Write all CP2 tasks and actions to plan.json.

options.label: Adjust
options.description: Something needs to change before writing.

questions.question: I've detailed CP1 and CP2. For CP3-6, I can either: detail them all now (will take a few more minutes), or we can finalize the plan with CP1-2 detailed and leave CP3-6 as outlines (you can detail them later with /agent-session:plan continue).

options.label: Detail all now
options.description: Continue detailing CP3-6 with full tasks and actions.

options.label: Finalize with CP1-2
options.description: Finalize the plan now. CP3-6 have task group outlines but no detailed tasks yet.

options.label: Just CP3 now
options.description: Detail only CP3, then ask again.
